gpt_comment: ⚠️[DIVERGENT] Verdict is unclear due to lack of data from YR.no and Météo Belgique. Meteoblue indicates sun but does not provide temperature or rain details. Seems like a potentially good day for bumblebees in Brussels, but more data would be helpful.
